values.description: or 0x8; Drawing only; only rebuilds the display of the views on the current drawing sheet
or 0x2; Assembly or drawing; Forces a rebuild of all geometry
or 0x1; Assembly or drawing; rebuilds geometry that has not been regenerated
or 0x10; Drawing only; only rebuilds drawing views that are dirty when OR'd with swCurrentSheetDisp option
or 0x4; Assembly only; only rebuilds mates, which is much faster than rebuilding the geometry. Especially useful for IComponent2::Transform2
